website_summaries.verdict: An easily accessible ladder in a bright case, making it easy to spot in emergencies.
pros: Very secure after placed on the window
Light enough for a child to carry
Comes with easy to understand instructions
cons: Labeled as a single use ladder, which means it cannot be used for practice

customer_reviews.title: Not Quite What I Expected
customer_reviews.text: The ladder hooks for the window sill are rigid and not adjustable, as they are with the Kidde brand. Hooks cover about a 6.5 inch reach, and my windowsills are about 8 inches. This could mean death in the event of a fire. The rungs seem to be sturdier than the Kidde brand and easier to put back together after deployed. The image on the phamplet doesn't match the actual item.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Wagener

customer_reviews.title: Have a family drill. Let the kids set them up. Dont keep them on the top shelf.
customer_reviews.text: look good, seem well built, now to never have to use them. please have a family drill every year and show the kids how they work. Dont keep them on the top shelf where the kids cant get them in an emergency, or you if you had a broken leg.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Lucus

customer_reviews.title: A very well designed and engineered ladder.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this Escape ladder and I am very happy with it. We just made sure it fit our window and it seems like it will be much easier to use than some of the other models out there which require you to unfold them. The window bracket on this one is all one piece and made of sturdy metal. We practised an emergency exit scenario with my daughter and I think she will be able to use this ladder on her own much easier than the folding models. I'm very satisfied with this purchase. Hopefully we'll never have to use it but its good to know it's there.
customer_reviews.author: Chili

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind in a box!
customer_reviews.text: Our family recently sat down with the kids to talk about fire safety and decided we needed to purchase an escape ladder for the upstairs. So glad we have it now. It will definitely provide peace of mind. The ladder seems to be really well made. It fits our window well.

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I have been meaning to purchase an escape ladder for several years, so I am excited to have peace of mind knowing that if we ever do have a need for one, we are set. This ladder comes in a lightweight bag with a zip top instead of a heavy and bulky metal one. The pictures on the top are easy to understand and because it's relatively lightweight, even a child could use it. While you never want to have to escape out a window, I feel so much better knowing we have a way out if the need arises.
